Asụsụ ndị Ogbi nke Burkina (na French: Langue des signes burkinabé ma ọ bụ Langue des signnes mossi) bụ asụsụ ndị ogbi nke obodo ndị ntị chiri na isi obodo Burkina Faso, nke aha ya bụ Ouagadougou

Agụmakwụkwọ ndị ntị chiri na Burkina bụ na American Sign Language (ASL) na Burkina Faso Sign Language a na-ewere dị ka asụsụ creole nke ASL.
E nwere mmadụ  puku iri ise na ise, na narị ise na Burkina
